      • loadXML

        public static ArgumentParser loadXML(String fileName)
        loads data from an XML file into an Argument Parser object
        Parameters:
        fileName - file name of XML to be used
        Returns:
        An Argument Parser object with data from XML file given
        Throws:
        MissingUsableArgumentException - when type is invalid
        FileErrorException - when file path is invalid

      • saveXML

        public static void saveXML(String fileName,
           ArgumentParser a)
        Saves data from an Argument Parser object into an XML file
        Parameters:
        fileName - file name of XML to be saved to
        a - Argument Parser object to turn into XML
        Throws:
        FileErrorException - when file to be saved to is read only
